name: Antler's Inferno (mkarlbom, Juuso Katravuori, QuickSilvery, Joonas Einola, LadyAlia)
name_original: Antler's Inferno (mkarlbom, Juuso Katravuori, QuickSilvery, Joonas Einola, LadyAlia)
description:
Our first 2D platformer as part of a study project. We have lot of ideas to develop game further, with more complex level structure and more innovative traps and interesting enemy AI.  Think of this more as Early Alpha version of the game. Let us know how you like it!

Made by:

Mikael Karlbom (https://mkarlbom.itch.io/)
Joonas Einola (https://joonaseinola.itch.io/)
Matti Paunonen (https://quicksilvery.itch.io/)
Mira Kainulainen (https://ladyalia.itch.io/)
Juuso Katravuori (https://juuso-katravuori.itch.io)
Elena Cherniavskaya
